ygData.msgSnippet: To answer your questions Koj 1) You chose death. You decide when your characters die. You have to be sensible about it. You just post damage until you decide

To answer your questions Koj 1) You chose death. You decide when your 
characters die. You have to be sensible about it. You just post 
damage until you decide you are ready to die. You may think that you 
could go on living forver because of that, but it's not true. If you 
do, everyone else will complain and shun you out of story lines, 
forcing you to quit the RPG, and 2) Snowcat's spark has left the body.
